channel.title: nerith
channel.description: A blog about FOSS software development and computer science.

item.title: debci and the Debian Continuous Integration Project
item.description:
Over the summer, I worked on the Debian Continuous Integration project under my mentor Antonio Terceiro as part of the Google Summer of Code.

My project involved improving the web interface of debci. I had to implement support for multiple suites and architectures, reduce the dependency the UI had on Javascript, and provide more information to package maintainers.

Expect more information here soonâ€¦
